page.title: 09Women in Marsworth
page.content: Of the women who remain in the village the age group varies considerably.Many of the{YOUNGER SET}have children still in infancy,preschool age or attending first school.Of the{MIDDLE AGE}group a high percentage of these women have jobscovering School teaching,clerical work,domestic services,Public House services,Home industrial projects, Voluntary help with the school, Playgroup Mother and toddler club, Meals on wheels,and Hospital services. Village Organisations for women are Womens Institute,Country dancing,Keep fit,Drama.Mostly the{RETIRED AGE GROUP remain house bound only going out of the village when for shopping or medical services.A Doctor and District nurse visit when required. There is an Evergreens club which meets monthly. Being an active village women support community work in many ways.
